message: Starting review of Code Analysis phase deliverables
Analyzing 32 findings from 4 agents against phase deliverables
Verified critical bugs in source code - preparing final verdict

Review complete - APPROVED. Verified all 3 deliverables met: 32 bugs documented with file:line citations, 14 SQLite migrations analyzed, 8 race conditions identified. All success criteria exceeded (3 bugs required, found 32; all have severity ratings and specific locations). Code verification confirmed critical bugs exist in source. Verdict submitted with 5 findings (4 praise, 1 suggestion).
